latitude_ddeg.title: Latitude [ddeg]
latitude_ddeg.description: Latitude coordinate in the Geographic Coordinate System using the WGS84 datum. Latitude lines are parallel to the equator where their position ranges from -90 degress at the south pole to 90 degrees at the north pole.

longitude_ddeg.title: Longitude [ddeg]
longitude_ddeg.description: Longitude coordinate in the Geographic Coordinate System using the WGS84 datum. Longitude lines are perpendicular to the equator where their position ranges from 0° at Greenwich Mean Time increasing to +180° as you move eastward and decreasing to −180° as you move westward.

measurement_station_type_id.title: Measurement Station Type ID
measurement_station_type_id.description: The type of measurement station. This must be one of either Mast, LiDAR or SoDAR.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name the measurement point is commonly referred to. This is the name that is used to refer to the data in an analysis and reporting.
